attributes.action: end the slaughter of black bears for guards' hats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Ministry of Defence use bear pelts to make headpieces for the Five Guards' regiments.  One bear is killed to make each bearskin cap.  It is time the MoD stop using real fur.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
